titleStmt.title: Frank L. Wolford to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG13623

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Active Militia Records - Capital Guards, North Cumberland Btn., and Three Forks Btn.
msIdentifier.idno: Box 76, Folder 864-866 1st REGT CAPITAL GUARDS CO A Frankfort Bn CORRESPONDENCE PERTAINING TO OFFICERS

body.p: Dear Govener -- I have seen your note and hope you will commission the bearer as Adgt as we will need a man of experience -- I will ^soon^ have the Redgt made. I am with high respect your humble servant
